website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced infant car seat with all the basic functions and an adorable Disney design.
cons: Some mechanics (seat belt, attachment to base) require elbow grease to work properly

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping around for a girly carseat and stumbled across this one. Its so cute! I didn't want to pay a fortune, but wanted something safe for my baby girl. So I went with this one. I must say the pictures don't do it justice! It's even cuter in person! It's a brighter pink. Light weight and is easy to get in and out of the base. It's actually got some cushion to it. Unlike the one I had for my son 3 years ago. My baby girl isn't here yet, but can't wait to put her in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kennysmom

customer_reviews.title: Carseat doesn't work after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carseat for a baby born in June. It is the beginning of October and the carseat is broken. The seat will not disconnect from the base so I either have to carry the full base with the carseat and try to restrap it in each time or carry the baby everywhere I go in my arms. I am seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Childs

customer_reviews.title: Great! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great! Sturdy, safe, light weight, plus adorable. 5 point harness, locks in base tight & secure. *Note, release handle for base is on top back of seat, As their were no directions for that. 😉
customer_reviews.author: +STITCHES+

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: While this car seat is super cute, I would not recommend it to be your sole carseat unless you add an insert for comfort. The cover is pretty thin. The colors are vibrant and and the minnie mouse head is adorable. The sun hood is nice also, but opening and closing it is a two handed chose as it is a bit flimsy. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase and this will be used on occasion for my granddaughters so won't get put to the test really.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cutest. Carseat. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CARSEAT. So cute. I adore this thing and I dont even like minnie mouse. Its so cute, and bonus. It has that little cover that goes around the carseat to cover feet and legs. The only thing I would say surprised me is that the buckle to the 5 point harness was a little different than the more commonly used buckles, but is self explanatory and still totally worth the buy. I saw another comment that said it would need to be put together, mine was completely put together in the box when I got it, just so everyone is informed. Love this carseat. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Lacks butt and back padding
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fine car seat. It’s lightweight and has several adjustable seatbelt options for growing baby. I gave four stars bc there’s not much padding at u see for baby’s butt or back which will make for a cranky car ride.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not near big enough!
customer_reviews.text: My niece just turned a month old and this carseat is almost too small for her. We hadnt used it because we always used the one my brother had but decided to fit her for it. We are sending it back. Wouldnt recommend if you plan to use it more than a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but not very sturdy, didn't feel like the baby was very safe in it. She outgrew it very fast.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good in size for the newborn. Comfortable and durable. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandamai Jayewickrame

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best thing about this car seat is how light it is! When I first picked it up that’s the first thing I noticed. The base is also very light. Most of the other car seats are super heavy. The visor is a little flimsy. Overall a great car seat
customer_reviews.author: Jescelia Upton

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. My daughter seems very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cutest carseat!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little carseat!! I love it! Got here in 2 days time! Easy to install and feels light weight. Seems easy enough to figure out how to buckle the child in and everything. I'm not a first time mother but Im not due for about another month so ill update after I actually use it with my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Courtneyz

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I do like that it is very light but the buckle takes a while to figure out the first few times and can be a pain in the ass with a child who doesn't want to be buckled. Very cute though
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and I love her and my soon to be granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter whom is pregnant with her 1st child. She loves it and I love her and my soon to be granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. It's light which is great because they can become pretty heavy as the baby grows bigger. The straps and buckles are pretty easy to handle but also safe. The only thing I don't like about the car seat is the head piece that folds up and down. The material is flimsy and not very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke on this seat sad waist of money
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely adorable. My 2 yr old has a Minnie mouse car seat and thought it would be cute that they match. But the visor is cheaply made it started to fall apart the first 2 uses. There is no head support for a newborn. It is bigger and bulkier than my previous newborn car seat.
customer_reviews.author: dawn bertrand

customer_reviews.title: We love our little one in this seat
customer_reviews.text: We love our little one in this seat! The plastic piece that holds the canopy together kept coming apart so I ended up taping the snaps together. Other than that we like the seat. It is not overly cushioned so we bought a fluffy liner and head rest for our princess. She loves to ride in it so it must be pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hope she likes it and most important is safety ratings are good.
customer_reviews.text: Now hopefully the receipent will. It is a shower gift and it's the cutest little girl infant seat I've seen. Hope she likes it and most important is safety ratings are good.
customer_reviews.author: faroneve

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Bought this for my 8year old daughters baby doll!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, adorable, & cushion
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute & adorable. Also has cushion. I really like it. Only down side is it's not a lot of head support.
customer_reviews.author: Niecee

customer_reviews.title: Good seat but can be improved
customer_reviews.text: Could of been perfect except I don't like the connection or click in. It doesn't feel secure and has a little play in it or wiggle room. Hopefully it's normal and doesn't just fly out.
customer_reviews.author: sly5789

customer_reviews.title: ... car seat felt and looked very durable and was beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: This car seat felt and looked very durable and was beautiful to look at! Glad I choose it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler. Too big for infant
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is nice with a cover for the child's feet. It is just too big for a newborn baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lovely car seat only problem was we prepare ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lovely car seat only problem was we prepare everything for a baby girl and a baby boy came often 3 ultrasounds
customer_reviews.author: Melissa bingham

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a newborn and I think she loves it I like the fact it's Minnie mouse and the safety of it is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t feel like baby is safe in it
customer_reviews.text: The base is very flimsy and doesn’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hall-Conner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seat. Love it. Only thing thing is the plastic in the pull over shade is flimsy and broke in less than two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: It very nice, but I would have given 5 stars if ...
customer_reviews.text: It very nice , but I would have given 5 stars if the instructions were more clear .
customer_reviews.author: Death

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: The gf and I got this for our three month old daughter and we love it. Only problem is that our baby's feet hang off, think is was made for tiny babies. Still love it tho
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good space!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable car seat for our babies; we will order an addional one to replace a current one that is not as confortable to travel with our babies!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome product worth the money. i just love this for our baby girl
customer_reviews.author: Shivram Raghubar

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Feels very cheap the carseat doesn't connect in the base as secure as it should. It doesn't feel safe
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister in law, she absolutely loves it! Great buy! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight infant car seat
customer_reviews.text: This light weight infant car seat is the best. Just as it states is is very light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MRS. J

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! Very durable and design is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and safer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Safe, cute and sound ! Simple enough to put baby safely in the car with no worries and functions properly according to child safety guidelines which was also double checked by the nurses who made sure baby was seated properly no frivolous excess I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: MamaEesh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s light but the handle is always a pain to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good, still using very comfortable and useful. recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeyhun Huseynov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat.....havent used yet....waiting for baby to be born....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came exactly like the picture and is made comfy for baby
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Baby shower gift and the Mommy loves it. It came exactly like the picture and is made comfy for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Great support great durability easy to carry and light weight and the foot cover is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carseat for my niece and we absolutely love it and it's so adorable. She looks like a little princess in it .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah larson

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat!! It's so cute my daughter looks so adorable in it.. People ask me all the time where I bought the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: luz maria

customer_reviews.title: But not good quality and canopy will not stay snapped
customer_reviews.text: Cute.... But not good quality and canopy will not stay snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: ... adjust the straps to fit the baby would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I still am not able to adjust the straps to fit the baby would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it but..
customer_reviews.text: Car seat came earlier then expected! Everything from color and other details looked exactly like the car seat photo described. Haven't used it just yet, due date in January. Will update everything as soon as I start.
customer_reviews.author: Kandis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Its a great carseat
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this carseat. Its light weight I love the design of it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: and its very pretty. I received a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, and its very pretty. I received a lot of compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Side of the base will break
customer_reviews.text: I love the car seat but half of my base is not clicking in. So I have to give it 1 star. Safety 1st!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat!! Perfect for my grand daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Misty K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lightest carseat and very cute! Love the colors got a diaper bag that matches.

customer_reviews.title: great seat fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: my daughter fit in perfectly and my wife loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Romero

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Mouse car seat
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and very beautiful! Can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fairall

customer_reviews.title: It feels nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by this car seat... It feels nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not made well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. The hood has flimsy plastic to hold it up. It also keeps coming apart from the inside of the cover (hood) and you have to keep pulling the two plastic pieces out and putting them back together. It's such a pain!!! I bought this way too early and now can't return it. We HATE this carrier and can't use the hood. I do not recommend this seat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful seat! I've gotten lots of compliments! Came fast and on time :)
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love product, I was going to return ONLY because it was a gift and was other seats as gifts. They loved the one I got so I won9be sending it back !!!! It's easy to clean and I'm very happy seeing De'Aira in it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia a Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. But I would recommend you also buy something that holds your baby's head in place. Because without it your baby's head will be bouncing around or going slanting to on side of the car seat
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I guess it's ok
customer_reviews.text: looks like the pictures but the fabric is not that great
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Looks as beautiful as it is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Looks as beautiful as it is pictured. Came assembled. Very satisfied overall :)
customer_reviews.author: czaragoza

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't sit right in the backseat. It doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't sit right in the backseat. It doesn't seem very secure. I even took it to a local police station for help setting it up in the backseat because I thought I was doing something wrong and it was confirmed that this isn't a very safe carseat.
customer_reviews.author: dazia

product_meta.title: Disney Baby Minnie Mouse Light 'n Comfy 22 Luxe Infant Car Seat (Dot)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkGive your baby a cozy ride with a favorite Disney friend in the Disney Baby Minnie Mouse Light 'n Comfy 22 Luxe Infant Car Seat. Made to accommodate even a 4-pound tiny traveler, this rear-facing LATCH-equipped car seat provides a cozy ride. Extra-lightweight, this baby car seat is easy to carry. The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the car seat and features five heights and three buckle locations. Side-impact protection built into this infant car seat keeps your little one extra secure. A Minnie Mouse-shaped infant insert at the top of the car seat gives little travelers an extra snug fit. This car seat meets or exceeds federal and ASTM safety standards and includes a one-year limited warranty. Shopping for baby doesn’t have to be an ordinary task—it can be a joyful discovery that starts with Disney Baby and ends in your nursery, living room, and every place you interact with your little one. Disney Baby takes pride in helping families connect by offering apparel, gear, toys, play mats, bedding and other items that inspire every moment of the day.

BRAND STORY
By Disney by Dorel
feature_bullets: Made for infants from 4 to 22 pounds, this rear-facing Disney Baby LATCH-equipped car seat provides a cozy ride
Extra-lightweight, this Minnie Mouse baby car seat is easy to carry
The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the car seat and features five heights and three buckle locations
Built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure
A Minnie Mouse-shaped infant insert gives little travelers an extra snug fit
This car seat meets or exceeds federal and ASTM safety standards and includes a one-year limited warranty

Shopping for baby doesn’t have to be an ordinary task—it can be a joyful discovery that starts with Disney Baby and ends in your nursery, living room, and every place you interact with your little one. Disney Baby takes pride in helping families connect by offering apparel, gear, toys, play mats, bedding and other items that inspire every moment of the day
